about_the_game:
In a world shrouded by darkness and ruled over by Eldritch monstrosities, embark on a journey to restore the last beacon of light and discover the legacy of the Light Keepers. Reclaim the unique powers of your ancestors and discover the secrets of their past as you fight your way through a large, interconnected world. Explore long lost temples, coastal cliffs, and everything in between while befriending the unique sea-inspired denizens of the land along the way. Forage for unique ingredients and discover powerful (and tasty) recipes as you embark on an epic journey filled with just the right amount of creepy, cozy and tentacles.

Control Your Light

  • In a world covered in darkness, your soft glow is a beacon for hostility.
  • Evade enemies by controlling your glow,
  • Launch extra damaging surprise attacks and navigate otherwise impossible challenges.

Foraging and crafting

  • Collect and discover many unique ingredients across the land.
  • Unlock and discover powerful recipes that change the way you play and help keep you alive in a dangerous world.

Metroidvania style design

  • Inspired by classic metroidvanias and souls-lite combat.
  • Combines non-linear exploration and crafting with unique, skill-based combat encounters and platforming challenges.

Hand drawn and hand animated characters and levels

  • Explore a large variety of unique hand crafted environments.
  • Discover hidden secrets, ancient relics and strange friends and foes alike.
  • Mix a little cozy in with your sea monsters - make a home for yourself in the aptly named Pier Town.

Challenging, precision combat

  • Master an expanding set of combat and movement abilities to defeat ever more challenging foes.
  • Choose the playstyle that works for you by combining powerful Relics.

Intricate platforming

  • Utilize an array of fluid movement abilities to conquer even the most complex platforming sequences.

Deep, discoverable lore and mythology

  • Uncover the mysteries of the past as told through items, conversations and environmental storytelling.
  • Discover the mythology that drives the world, and come face to face with its Gods.



Through lands shrouded by primordial darkness and dominated by creatures of legend, will you embrace your legacy and take up the mantle of the last Light Keeper?

Reclaim the unique powers of your ancestors and discover the secrets of their past as you fight your way through a large, interconnected world. linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Zen 2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560 / AMD 8 RDNA 2
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Zen 2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or similar
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Phosfi

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIndows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560 or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or similar
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Phosfi is an atmospheric, metroidvania style action-platformer. Explore and fight your way through a dark and dangerous coastal world full of mysteries and ancient treasures. Discover long buried temples and fend off Eldritch monstrosities in this beautiful 2D hand drawn and animated adventure.
